channel.title: Comments on: Nature rejects the monarch, not the man; The subject, not the citizen; for kings And subjects, mutual foes, forever play A losing game into each other’s hands. Shelly Queen Mab. These are the hired bravos who defend The tyrant’s throne -the bullies of his fear;
channel.description: Exegesis Hermeneutics Flux Capacitor of Truthiness

item.title: By: “A fiction that elevates my soul is dearer to me than a host of base and despicable truths”. – Not The Grub Street Journal
